Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs in the entire event log
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' as a terminal or near-terminal activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' following 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences that are immediately preceded by 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Ratio of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' to 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Number of variants where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears after an EIC acceptance decision (e.g., 'RW-EIC Accept' or 'SW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that originated from a major or minor revision cycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in cases that also contain 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' at any point in their lifecycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities that occur within 7 days of a 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' is directly followed by 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of all accepted manuscripts (ending with 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch') that passed through at least one 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activity during review
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in variants that include reviewer agreement activities ('SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'RW-Reviewer Agreed', or 'RSW-Reviewer Agreed')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences relative to the total number of end-of-process indicators in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of distinct case IDs that reach 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' after having completed a full peer-review cycle involving 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs
